column4: I'm sure this is an incredibly stupid and easy to answer question, but how do I get the shutdown button to go back all the way in the top right corner? it's outside the main tray...
right select and unlock the buttons.
then right select and choose move.
it won't move any further to the right. I have shutdown, a dividing line, ktorrent, xchat, rythembox, wcid, battery, sound, clock
are any panel buttons in the spot you want to move the button too that are locked?
the clock is..
unlock it before you can move anything to the spot.
it has to move too.
I unlocked the clock, but it still won't let me flush the shutdown button in the far right corner
is the shutdown button also unlocked?
yes
you don't have a double line of dots (handle) there that's locked?
ah
they were locked
bingo?
oh shit
I clicked remove from panel, now ktorrent, xchat, wicd, and rythembox are all gone
just click on add to panel and choose notification area.
alright, I got all my icons back
thanks
no probs.
